name: Dental Hygiene
description: Preventive oral healthcare, dental hygiene practice, and patient education

questions.question_text: Describe the steps of a comprehensive periodontal assessment.
questions.expected_answer: Probing depths, bleeding on probing, CAL, recession, furcation, mobility

questions.question_text: How do you tailor oral hygiene instructions for different patient populations?
questions.expected_answer: Age-appropriate education, cultural sensitivity, learning styles, demonstrations

questions.question_text: Explain the process of dental scaling and root planing.
questions.expected_answer: Instrumentation technique, ultrasonic vs hand scaling, tissue response

questions.question_text: How do you manage a patient with dental anxiety?
questions.expected_answer: Communication, tell-show-do, distraction, relaxation techniques

questions.question_text: What infection control protocols do you follow in dental hygiene practice?
questions.expected_answer: OSHA standards, sterilization, PPE, surface disinfection, waste management

questions.question_text: Describe your approach to taking and interpreting dental radiographs.
questions.expected_answer: Technique selection, exposure parameters, ALARA principle, interpretation

questions.question_text: How do you identify and document signs of oral cancer?
questions.expected_answer: Extraoral/intraoral examination, suspicious lesion characteristics, referral

questions.question_text: Tell me about your experience with patients who have special healthcare needs.
questions.expected_answer: Adaptation techniques, communication, treatment modifications, empathy

questions.question_text: What is the connection between periodontal disease and systemic health?
questions.expected_answer: Cardiovascular link, diabetes, pregnancy complications, inflammation

questions.question_text: How do you manage medical emergencies in a dental setting?
questions.expected_answer: BLS certification, emergency kit, syncope management, anaphylaxis protocol

questions.question_text: Describe the fluoride therapies you are trained to provide.
questions.expected_answer: Types of fluoride, application methods, indications, contraindications

questions.question_text: How do you approach treatment planning for patients with diabetes?
questions.expected_answer: Blood glucose awareness, healing considerations, appointment timing, communication with physician

questions.question_text: What is your experience with dental sealant application?
questions.expected_answer: Tooth selection, isolation, application technique, evaluation

questions.question_text: How do you handle a situation where you suspect child abuse or neglect?
questions.expected_answer: Mandatory reporting, documentation, signs of abuse, reporting procedures

questions.question_text: Describe your approach to nutritional counseling for dental health.
questions.expected_answer: Sugar intake, acidic foods, dietary analysis, practical recommendations

questions.question_text: How do you maintain and sharpen dental instruments?
questions.expected_answer: Sharpening techniques, instrument evaluation, ergonomic considerations

questions.question_text: What is your experience with polishing and stain removal?
questions.expected_answer: Selective polishing, abrasive agents, contraindications, technique

questions.question_text: How do you ensure proper ergonomics during clinical practice?
questions.expected_answer: Positioning, equipment adjustment, stretching, injury prevention

questions.question_text: Describe the stages of periodontal disease and treatment at each stage.
questions.expected_answer: Gingivitis through advanced periodontitis, treatment escalation

questions.question_text: How do you build rapport and trust with new patients?
questions.expected_answer: Active listening, empathy, clear communication, comfort measures
